name: FireStarter (itch)
description:
This is our game made in 24 hours for the First Jam 3, hosted by Rubika.

You're a little spark and you have to find combustible to keep your flame big enough to survive and grow. Watch out for puddles of water !

/!\ This game is design to be play with a controller /!\

Game Design : Adrien Dourgnon , François Noël & Guilhem D'humières

Level Design : Adrien Dourgnon & François Noël

Sound Design & Music : Guilhem D'humières

Arts : Cédric Bagein

Code: Julien "Bernik" Cabezas

We hope you will enjoy the experience :D
